name: Run Hello World Job and Validate UI and CLI Results
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **UI** during onboarding.
- Create new project via **CLI**.
- Run `Hello World` Job via **CLI**.

Verify that:

- Job executed successfully in **CLI**.
- Job is displayed in successful jobs via **UI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via UI during onboarding.
  • Create new project via CLI.
  • Run Hello World Job via CLI.

Verify that:

  • Job executed successfully in CLI.
  • Job is displayed in successful jobs via UI.

steps.name: Verify Apolo CLI client is installed

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **UI** during onboarding.
- Create new project via **CLI**.
- Run `Hello World` Job via **CLI**.

Verify that:

- Job executed successfully in **CLI**.
- Job is displayed in successful jobs via **UI**.
